titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Perspecta, School of Architecture, Yale University, Records
Perspecta, School of Architecture, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday April 18, 2019 at 07:22

did.unittitle: Perspecta, School of Architecture, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of editorial and financial correspondence, copyrights, reviews, architectural drawings, articles, accounting records, and photographs and negatives documenting the publication of Perspecta, a journal of the Yale School of Architecture (formerly the School of Architecture and Design and School of Art and Architecture).

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. School of Architecture and Design

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. School of Art and Architecture

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 19-E (YRG 19-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Architecture.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Perspecta, School of Architecture, Yale University, Records (RU 336). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of editorial and financial correspondence, copyrights, reviews, architectural drawings, articles, accounting records, and photographs and negatives documenting the publication of Perspecta , a journal of the Yale School of Architecture (formerly the School of Architecture and Design and School Art and Architecture).

did.unittitle: Biographical Data, Volume 1: See Box 9 Folder 192
